attributes.action: Restrict non-skilled workers from entering the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the midst of an economic crisis, the last thing needed is more immigration.  Jobs are being lost across the UK faster than has been seen for a generation. Those lucky enough to keep their jobs will be supporting the unemployed, we cant afford to let immigrants into the UK as the relatively small amount of jobs available should be going to the UK jobless, to relieve the burden on the taxpayer.
